cmt#Meta-Reviewer: The metareviewer is the child of the reviewer and the user. The administrator is the parent of the user.
cmt#Reviewer: The metareviewer is the parent of the reviewer and the conferencemember. The programcommitteechair is the parent of the programcommitteemember and the user is the parent of the administrator.
cmt#Decision: The decision is the parent of rejection and acceptance.
cmt#Person: The parent of a programcommittee member is the programcommitteechair, which is the equivalent of the chairman. The externalreviewer is also a parent of the user and the conferencemember. The author is the coauthor and the conferencemember is the parent of the conferencemember.
cmt#Document: The parent of paper is paperabstract. The document is the parent of review and metareview.
cmt#Conference: The conference is child of Thing.
cmt#ConferenceChair: The conferencechair is the parent of the programcommitteemember and the programcommitteechair. The chairman is the child of the conferencechair and the programcommitteechair.
cmt#ConferenceMember: The parent of the conferencechair is the associatedchair. The conferencemember is the parent of the programcommittee and the reviewer. The reviewer is the parent of the metareviewer and the author is the child of the user.
cmt#AssociatedChair: The associatedchair is the parent of the external reviewer. The chairman is the child of the conferencemember and the chairman is the parent of the conferencechair.
cmt#ProgramCommitteeMember: The programcommitteechair is the parent of the programcommittee member and the conferencechair. The chairman is the child of the programcommittee and the external reviewer is the parent of the programcommittee member.
cmt#AuthorNotReviewer: authornotreviewer is a child of the author and the user.
cmt#ExternalReviewer: The externalreviewer is the child of the user and the parent of the user.
cmt#Chairman: The chairman is the equivalent of the programcommitteechair and the associatedchair. The chairman is the child of the user and the parent of the coauthor. The user is the parent of the coauthor and the programcommittee member.
cmt#ProgramCommitteeChair: The programcommitteechair is the child of the programcommitteemember and the parent of the conferencemember. The chairman is the equivalent of the associatedchair and the programcommitteechair is the child of the programcommitteemember.
cmt#Acceptance: Acceptance is the child of the decision and rejection is the parent of the decision.
cmt#Rejection: The rejection is the child of the decision which is the parent of the acceptance.
cmt#Review: Metareview is the parent of review which is a document which is the parent of paper.
cmt#Paper: Paper is the parent of paperabstract and paperfullversion. It is also the parent of review and metareview.
cmt#Author: The author is the child of the user and the parent of the conferencemember. The coauthor is also the parent of the programcommitteechair and the programcommitteemember.
cmt#User: The parent of the externalreviewer is the administrator. The reviewer is the child of the conference member and the coauthor is the author.
cmt#Co-author: The coauthor is the child of the author who is the parent of authornotreviewer.
cmt#PaperAbstract: paperabstract is a child of paper and is the parent of paperfullversion.
cmt#PaperFullVersion: The paperfullversion is a child of paper which is also a child of a document.
cmt#Administrator: The administrator is the child of the user who is the parent of the reviewer who is a member of the conference.
cmt#Meta-Review: The metareview is a child of review which is a document which is parented by paper which is a paperfullversion.
